data.name: COMMONS
data.description: The Commons Token is designed to empower and sustain the development and protection of community-driven resources, initiatives, and shared assets. Its purpose is to create a collaborative economy that supports the creation, preservation, and enhancement of the commons—both physical and digital—while ensuring shared ownership, equitable access, and long-term sustainability for everyone involved. Through decentralized governance, the Commons Token encourages active participation, rewarding those who contribute to the growth and well-being of the collective.
